class.name: WindowDecoration
class.brief_description: A move / resize region for the native [Window].
class.description: A move / resize region, used to implement client side decorations for the native [Window].

members.member: If [code]true[/code], polygonal region is used instead of control bounds.

The region's list of vertices. The final point will be connected to the first. [b]Note:[/b] Used only if [member non_rectangular_region] is [code]true[/code]. [b]Note:[/b] This returns a copy of the [PackedVector2Array] rather than a reference.
